languages.text: {n}Кляйн багровеет.{/n} "Закрой пасть, Хротко! Я такого повидал, столько мразей задавил... Хотите, чтобы я еще одного распотрошил? Кровь его мутантскую на руках моих видеть хотите? Будет вам кровь!"

{n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"
languages.original_text: {n}Кляйн багровеет.{/n} "Закрой пасть, Хротко! Я такого повидал, столько мразей задавил... Хотите, чтобы я еще одного распотрошил? Кровь его мутантскую на руках моих видеть хотите? Будет вам кровь!"

{n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

{n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

{n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

{n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

languages.text: {n}Klein s'empourpre.{/n} « Bouclez-la, Hrotko ! J'ai vu des tas d'horreurs dans ma vie, et j'ai écrasé de mes mains bon nombre de monstres... Vous voulez que j'en étripe un de plus ? Vous voulez que je me salisse les mains avec les entrailles de ce mutant ? Si c'est du sang que vous voulez, vous allez être servi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Klein s'empourpre.{/n} « Bouclez-la, Hrotko ! J'ai vu des tas d'horreurs dans ma vie, et j'ai écrasé de mes mains bon nombre de monstres... Vous voulez que j'en étripe un de plus ? Vous voulez que je me salisse les mains avec les entrailles de ce mutant ? Si c'est du sang que vous voulez, vous allez être servi ! »

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Klein se tiñe de rojo.{/n} «¡Que te calles, Hrotko! Con la de cosas que he visto, la de escoria a la que he aplastado... ¿Quieres que destripe a otro? ¿Quieres ver su sangre mutante en mis manos? ¡Te voy a dar sangre!».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Klein se tiñe de rojo.{/n} «¡Que te calles, Hrotko! Con la de cosas que he visto, la de escoria a la que he aplastado... ¿Quieres que destripe a otro? ¿Quieres ver su sangre mutante en mis manos? ¡Te voy a dar sangre!».

languages.text: {n}克莱因猛地涨红了脸。{/n}“给我闭上你的臭嘴，赫洛卡！我见过那么多大场面，收拾过那么多怪物……你想让我再开膛一个？想看到我手上再次沾满变种人的鲜血？那我就让你见识见识！”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因猛地涨红了脸。{/n}“给我闭上你的臭嘴，赫洛卡！我见过那么多大场面，收拾过那么多怪物……你想让我再开膛一个？想看到我手上再次沾满变种人的鲜血？那我就让你见识见识！”

languages.text: {n}クラインの顔が真っ赤に染まった。{/n}「黙れ、フロトコ！私が目撃したもの、潰した汚れ…。また内臓をえぐり出せと言うのか？私の手についた変異体の血を見たいか？なら血を見せてやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインの顔が真っ赤に染まった。{/n}「黙れ、フロトコ！私が目撃したもの、潰した汚れ…。また内臓をえぐり出せと言うのか？私の手についた変異体の血を見たいか？なら血を見せてやる！」

languages.text: {n}Kleins Gesicht färbt sich dunkelrot.{/n} "Haltet den verdammten Mund, Hrotko! Was ich gesehen habe, welche Missgeburten ich zerquetscht habe ... Ihr wollt, dass ich noch eine ausweide? Ihr wollt ihr Mutantenblut an meinen Händen sehen? Ich zeige Euch Blut!"
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kleins Gesicht färbt sich dunkelrot.{/n} "Haltet den verdammten Mund, Hrotko! Was ich gesehen habe, welche Missgeburten ich zerquetscht habe ... Ihr wollt, dass ich noch eine ausweide? Ihr wollt ihr Mutantenblut an meinen Händen sehen? Ich zeige Euch Blut!"

languages.text: {n}Klein'ın yüzü kıpkırmızı kesiliyor.{/n} "Kahrolası çeneni kapa Hrotko! Gördüğüm tüm o şeyler, ezip geçtiğim tüm o pislikler... Birini daha deşmemi mi istiyorsun? Ellerime mutant kanının bulaştığını görmek mi istiyorsun? Sana kan neymiş gösteririm!"
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's face turns a deep red.{/n} "Shut your damn mouth, Hrotko! The things I've seen, the filth I've crushed... You want me to gut another one? You want to see its mutant blood on my hands? I'll show you blood!"
